articles.author: Kara Fox, CNN
articles.title: The energy crisis couldn't have come at a worse time for climate - CNN
articles.description: Chinese officials are ordering coal plants to dramatically ramp up production. The European Union is facing a revolt over its ambitious Green Deal on climate. US President Joe Biden is petitioning OPEC nations to boost oil production.

articles.author: Steven Erlanger
articles.title: Why Is Poland Fighting the Supremacy of European Union Courts? - The New York Times
articles.description: Poland argues that its courts should supersede the bloc’s top court. The E.U. sharply disagrees.
articles.content:
The Polish government argues that national judiciary systems fall outside the scope of E.U. authority. So the European courts rulings in the case were unlawful, the government said.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch OLED launches today, but buyers in the US and Europe report delays - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The revamped console launches today, but most stores don't have it in stock.
articles.content:
The Nintendo Switch OLED is going on sale today or was supposed to, anyway. The pre-orders are over and retailers should be shipping consoles to early buyers, but they are reporting delays.

articles.title: European airline ditches high heels for Nike trainers - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Also out at SkyUp Airlines are tight blouses and pencil skirts, replaced by a loose suit with trousers and a white T-shirt.
articles.content:
A European budget airline is ditching high heels, blouses and pencil skirts for its female flight attendants in a bid to make the working environment more comfortable for the crew.
